definition: to argue (that)/to allege/to dispute/to plead (e.g. not guilty)

sentences.english: But Myhra argues that the plane was indeed intentionally designed for stealth.
sentences.chinese: 但是Myhra辩称这架飞机确实是为了隐形而设计。

sentences.english: The Pentagon argued that the United States can do whatever it wants in international waters.
sentences.chinese: 五角大楼辩称美国可以在国际水域做任何事情。

sentences.english: Compartamos also argues that its profits will build a microfinance industry.
sentences.chinese: 国民银行辩称，其利润将用来打造小额贷款产业。

sentences.english: They argued in effect better that one should die so that three could survive.
sentences.chinese: 辩称“牺牲一人保全三人“是更好的结果。

sentences.english: Still, Hall argued that the law was constitutional.
sentences.chinese: 豪尔还是辩称该法合宪。

sentences.english: Kim, however, defends Melanie to the officer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，金姆，向女警们为梅勒妮辩称。

sentences.english: Doctors and parents who support these surgeries claim that the child understands.
sentences.chinese: 赞成这些手术的医生和父母辩称孩子了解一切。

sentences.english: She acknowledged that error and said that "he had to do a year over" to cover.
sentences.chinese: 她知道马失前蹄了，辩称“他确实需要念多一年书”。

sentences.english: Supporters says the corrida is an art form that it is vital to preserve.
sentences.chinese: 支持斗牛者还辩称斗牛是一项必须保存的艺术形式。

sentences.english: The robber pled that he was forced to do it.
sentences.chinese: 抢匪辩称他是被迫去抢劫的。

sentences.english: And that's exactly what Dugan's lawyers argued at trial last November.
sentences.chinese: 而这正是去年11月杜根的律师在审讯中辩称的。

sentences.english: But Ezcurra argues that Cancun was built with fatal flaws.
sentences.chinese: 不过埃兹柯拉辩称，坎昆是在致命缺失上建造起来的。

definition: another case (in law)/a case to treat separately
appellee (side that won in trial court, whose victory is being appealed by losing side)
(of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
